properties.description: Load Employee master data from Data Lake to SQL Database

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source
source sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmployeeID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink
